attributes.action: Protect British People get rid of Muslim Fundamentalists
attributes.additional_details: Today 22 May 2013 an innocent British Solider was hacked to death just yards from his barracks in broad daylight, not by a madman, by a Muslim Terrorist, something has to be done by this Government, enough is enough, if nothing is done then British people will start taking matters into their own hands, get these fundamentalists OUT starting with Abu Hamza
